name: Cable Rush
description:
Think on your feet while managing the power supply to your towers! Strategically activate and power up towers at advantageous times while fighting relentless waves of enemies!

Play with keyboard or controller. Fullscreen recommended!

-- TEAM BOTTLE GHOST --

GammaFoxTBG - Programming

struuuudel - Programming/Design

Arkanpixel - Art/Design Support

Fer-i - Art/Animation

Alejandro PHz - Music and SFX/Design Support
